response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer priced at $950,000. This exceptional opportunity allows you to acquire a product that is valued at $1,000,000 but at a more favorable rate. I trust this offer will be attractive to you and encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
